content: Referral Event for active community of PLEXUSðŸ”¥OverviewðŸ”¥Referral Event for active community of PLEXUSTotal of $2,000 airdrop to the top 100 participants.ðŸš€How to participateðŸš€Create your own PLEXUS Discord invitation code and invite friends.You can earn points by completing various tasks.The more points you earn, the higher the chance of winning.ðŸ“†Event periodðŸ“†The event will be held for 2 months.Start : September 2, 2022End : October 31, 2022Airdrop date : After beta service launch on November.Winners will be announced in PLEXUS Discord or via email.Event page : https://gleam.io/3rbMp/plexus
